meanings.definition: A type of sedimentary rock formed from the accumulation of diatom shells.
meanings.sent1: The diatomites in the cliffs are made up of tiny diatom shells.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study diatomites to understand ancient environments.
meanings.sent3: The diatomites in the quarry told stories of the ocean's past inhabitants.
meanings.sent4: The layers of diatomites resembled a history book written by nature.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the diatomites revealed intricate patterns of ancient life.
